div.script: var photoGallery6417= {"Album": {"title":"Rotating Photos - 674 x 364","description":"","transitiondelay":"11","fadestyle":"NO","gallerywidth":"674","backgroundaudio":"/cms/lib/PA01001072/Centricity/ModuleInstance/7622/","loopaudio":"False","lgpath":"/cms/lib/PA01001072/Centricity/ModuleInstance/7622/large/","tnpath":"/cms/lib/PA01001072/Centricity/ModuleInstance/7622/thumbs/","Images": [{"photoname":"Stronger Together","src":"042020_Senior Banner_Street View.JPG?rnd=0.685491657203758","caption":"The SHHS Senior Celebration Committee has been hard at work devising ways to recognize the Class of 2020. One initiative is the awesome banner hung on the bridge on Providence Road with the message \"Stronger Together - Even Apart\". Thanks to the Swarthmore Fire Department for installing it.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Flexible Instruction","src":"033120_Online Learning.JPG?rnd=0.952354810644106","caption":"Thank you to our teachers, staff, students, and families for working together to transition to flexible instruction. Everybody would prefer to be back in their classrooms and schools, but we thank you all for your perseverance and support. We will get through this together!","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"WSSD Food Distribution","src":"042020_WSSD Food Distribution.JPG?rnd=0.0753204571433926","caption":"Children in the community ages 18 and under can receive meals from the Wallingford-Swarthmore School District on Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays from 10 a.m. - 12 p.m. at Strath Haven High School. Please check out the COVID-19 tab for more information.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"#PIAAtogether","src":"041420_PIAA Together.jpg?rnd=0.869037102846912","caption":"Saddened by the cancelled spring sport season, the PIAA is asking school districts to share a picture of their favorite HS stadium, field, or gym on Twitter using #PIAATogether. We can't wait to get our students and community back out onto our playing fields, courts, gym, track, pool, and more!","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"We Miss You!","src":"033020_We Miss You SRS.JPG?rnd=0.928044090479633","caption":"A picture is worth a thousand words - but this picture says it all in just three: WE MISS YOU! Although online flexible instruction has begun, our teachers and staff really want to be back in the classroom with their students. Until then, be safe and healthy.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"}]}}
